title: User Agent Blocking rules
description: User Agent Blocking rules perform access control for incoming requests that exactly match the "User-Agent" HTTP header value reported by the client.

links.title: Get User Agent Blocking rules
links.description: Fetches User Agent Blocking rules in a zone. You can filter the results using several optional parameters.

per_page.description: The maximum number of results per page. You can only set the value to `1` or to a multiple of 5 such as `5`, `10`, `15`, or `20`.

description.description: A string to search for in the description of existing rules.

user_agent.description: A string to search for in the user agent values of existing rules.

links.title: Create a User Agent Blocking rule
links.description: Creates a new User Agent Blocking rule in a zone.
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/firewall/ua_rules" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"id":"372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59","paused":false,"description":"Prevent access from abusive clients identified by this User Agent to mitigate a DDoS attack","mode":"js_challenge","configuration":{"target":"ua","value":"Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_12_5) AppleWebKit/603.2.4 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/10.1.1 Safari/603.2.4"}}'

id.description: The unique identifier of the User Agent Blocking rule.

paused.description: When true, indicates that the rule is currently paused.

description.example: "Prevent access from abusive clients identified by this User Agent to mitigate a DDoS attack"
description.description: An informative summary of the rule.

mode.description: The action to apply to a matched request.

target.description: The configuration target for this rule. You must set the target to `ua` for User Agent Blocking rules.

value.example: "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_12_5) AppleWebKit/603.2.4 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/10.1.1 Safari/603.2.4"
value.description: The exact user agent string to match. This value will be compared to the received `User-Agent` HTTP header value.

configuration.description: The configuration object for the current rule.

links.title: Get a User Agent Blocking rule
links.description: Fetches the details of a User Agent Blocking rule.

links.title: Update a User Agent Blocking rule
links.description: Updates an existing User Agent Blocking rule.
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/firewall/ua_rules/372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"id":"372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59","paused":false,"description":"Prevent access from abusive clients identified by this User Agent to mitigate a DDoS attack","mode":"js_challenge","configuration":{"target":"ua","value":"Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_12_5) AppleWebKit/603.2.4 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/10.1.1 Safari/603.2.4"}}'

id.description: The unique identifier of the User Agent Blocking rule.

paused.description: When true, indicates that the rule is currently paused.

description.example: "Prevent access from abusive clients identified by this User Agent to mitigate a DDoS attack"
description.description: An informative summary of the rule.

mode.description: The action to apply to a matched request.

target.description: The configuration target for this rule. You must set the target to `ua` for User Agent Blocking rules.

value.example: "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_12_5) AppleWebKit/603.2.4 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/10.1.1 Safari/603.2.4"
value.description: The exact user agent string to match. This value will be compared to the received `User-Agent` HTTP header value.

configuration.description: The configuration object for the current rule.

links.title: Delete a User Agent Blocking rule
links.description: Deletes an existing User Agent Blocking rule.

cfLinkErrors.10002: UserAgent rule not unique (edit the existing rather than adding a new)
cfLinkErrors.10015: Patch value not valid for given context

object_definition.title: User Agent Blocking rules
